intro: Handle Extreme Landing Situations in Airplane Flight Simulator : Dangerous Landings
description:
In Airplane Flight Simulator : Dangerous Landings, you take control of 33 unique airplanes across 15 action-packed levels and 3 free ride modes. Navigate through some of the most extreme flight emergencies, including engine fires, landing gear failures, dual engine flameouts, brake failures, flap issues and lightning strikes. Each level is set in a diverse environment, from snowy mountains to sunny beaches, vibrant towns and peaceful countryside, with both day and night scenarios to challenge your piloting skills. With realistic flight controls, immersive cockpit interiors, dynamic weather and day-night cycles, this simulator offers one of the most thrilling and authentic aviation experiences.

In Airplane Flight Simulator : Dangerous Landings, you must prove your skills as the ultimate pilot, managing to land safely under the most extreme conditions. With a global map showcasing realistic cities and airports, every landing challenges your skills to the fullest.

Features:

• Wide variety of airplane types (airliner, private jet, fighter aircraft, cargo aircraft and historic aircraft)
• A total of 33 different aircrafts included
• 15 adrenaline-filled landing scenarios
• 3 diverse free flight modes
• Detailed cockpits
• Realistic flight controls
• Dynamic weather system
• Accurate engine and failure sounds
• Challenges across day or night time

Take on the most challenging landings ever with Airplane Flight Simulator : Dangerous Landings!
